# details

**Instance Property**

The item’s details.

## Declaration

```swift
let details: Transaction.AdvancedCommerceInfo.Item.Details
```

## Instance Properties

- **refunds**: The list of refunds that were issued as part of this transaction.
- **revocationDate**: The date access to this item was revoked.

items.description: The list of refunds that were issued as part of this transaction.
